org.apache.twill.discovery

Interface ServiceDiscovered

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Iterable<Discoverable>

    public interface ServiceDiscovered
extends Iterable<Discoverable>
    Represents the result of service discovery. It extends from Iterable that gives set of latest Discoverable every time when Iterable.iterator() is invoked.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  ServiceDiscovered.ChangeListener
      Represents a callback for watching changes in the discovery list.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean contains(Discoverable discoverable)
      Checks if the given discoverable contains in the current discovery list.
      String getName()
      Returns the name of the service being discovered.
      Cancellable watchChanges(ServiceDiscovered.ChangeListener listener, Executor executor)
      Registers a ServiceDiscovered.ChangeListener to watch for changes in the discovery list.

      • Methods inherited from interface java.lang.Iterable

        iterator

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Returns the name of the service being discovered.
        Returns:
        Name of the service.

      • watchChanges

        Cancellable watchChanges(ServiceDiscovered.ChangeListener listener,
                       Executor executor)
        Registers a ServiceDiscovered.ChangeListener to watch for changes in the discovery list. The ServiceDiscovered.ChangeListener.onChange(ServiceDiscovered) method will be triggered when start watching, and on every subsequent changes in the discovery list.
        Parameters:
        listener - A ServiceDiscovered.ChangeListener to watch for changes.
        executor - A Executor for issuing call to the given listener.
        Returns:
        A Cancellable to cancel the watch.

      • contains

        boolean contains(Discoverable discoverable)
        Checks if the given discoverable contains in the current discovery list.
        Parameters:
        discoverable - The Discoverable to check for.
        Returns:
        true if it exists, false otherwise.
